Text.Language: W v/et qen pie~hoou m~mah coou qen v~nau n~ajp coou: au]ift nak e~qoun e~pic~tauroc: eybe v~nobi e~tafertolman e~rof n~je Adam qen piparadicoc: vwq m~pic~qi n~jij n~te nennobi: w~ Pi,~rictoc Pennou] ouoh nahmen.

O You who on the sixth day and in the sixth hour was nailed to the Cross for the sin which [our father] Adam dared to commit in Paradise, tear the handwriting of our sins, O Christ our God, and save us.
